casebody.data:
James Darnell SCOTT, petitioner,
v.
William R. BYARS, Jr., Director, South Carolina Department of Corrections. No. 12-10614. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Case below, 516 Fed.Appx. 281.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
